defect_observed.value: Trim tab actuator binding. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Door Mechanism component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock

preventive_action.value: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 11/05/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 13/05/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 13/05/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 16/05/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 20/05/2023 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Trim tab actuator binding. Malfunction reported by flight crew.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Door Mechanism component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock

ii. Preventive Action: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type
